only integer quantities can be entered. The line containing the quantity ″{quantity}″ has not been updated.
remove the item from the basket
Remove an article from the basket
Click the red X which is on the same line as the item that you want to delete.
Select the quantity from the list, and click the ″Update my basket″ button.
add a product to the basket
Click on the link ″I want to continue shopping″.
Do not forget to update your basket if you have changed the quantity!
The item {articleLabel} is out of stock.
The item {articleLabel} is no longer available.
The item {articleLabel} is no longer available. The related line has been deleted.
An item in your basket was no longer referenced in our database. The related line has therefore been deleted.
The item {articleLabel} is no longer available. A different reference to the same product has been selected instead.
An item from your basket was no longer referenced in our database. A different reference to the same product has been selected instead.
This item {articleLabel} is not available in a quantity of: {quantity} {unit}. The currently available quantity is {availableQuantity} {availableUnit}.
The line {cartLineLabel} is no longer available, it has therefore been deleted.
The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ is no longer valid. The related reference has therefore been deleted.
The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ no longer exists. The related reference has therefore been deleted.
The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ is invalid.

The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ requires an order of least {minProductCount} items (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to add {missingProductCount} items to your basket, or to remove this coupon.

The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ requires an order of at most {maxProductCount} items (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exceedingProductCount} items from your basket, or to remove this coupon.

The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ requires an order of at least {minCartAmount} (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to add {missingCartAmount}items to your basket, or to remove this coupon.

The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ requires an order of at most {maxCartAmount} (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exceedingCartAmount} items from your basket, or to remove this coupon.
The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ is limited to packages above {minCartWeight}. The current weight of your basket is {currentCartWeight}.
The coupon ″{label}″ with code ″{code}″ is limited to packages under {maxCartWeight}. The current weight of your basket is {currentCartWeight}.

The payment method ″{label}″ requires an order of at least {minProductCount} items (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to add {missingProductCount} items to your basket, or to select another payment method.

The payment method ″{label}″ requires an order of at most {maxProductCount} items (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exccedingProductCount} items from your basket, or to select another payment method.

The payment method ″{label}″ requires an order of at least {minCartAmount} (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to add {missingCartAmount} items to your basket, or to select another payment method.

The payment method ″{label}″ requires an order of at most {maxCartAmount} (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exceedingCartAmount} items from your basket, or to select another payment method.
The payment method ″{label}″ is limited to packages of more than {minCartWeight}. The current weight of your basket is {currentCartWeight}.
The payment method ″{label}″ is limited to packages under {maxCartWeight}. The current weight of your basket is {currentCartWeight}.
The payment method ″{label}″ is no longer valid and has therefore been removed from your order.
The payment method that you had chosen is no longer available and has therefore been removed from your order.

The shipping method ″{label}″ requires an order of at least {minProductCount} items (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to add {missingProductCount} items to your basket, or to select another shipping method.

The shipping method ″{label}″ requires an order of at most {minProductCount} items (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exceedingProductCount} items from your basket, or to select another shipping method.

The shipping method ″{label}″ requires an order of at most {maxCartAmount} (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exceedingCartAmount} items from your basket, or to select another shipping method.

The shipping method ″{label}″ requires an order of at most {minCartAmount} (excluding special offers). To place your order, you need to remove {exceedingCartAmount} items from your basket, or to select another shipping method.
The shipping method ″{label}″ is limited to packages above {minCartWeight}. The current weight of your basket is {currentCartWeight}.
The shipping method ″{label}″ is limited to packages under {maxCartWeight}. The current weight of your basket is {currentCartWeight}.
The shipping method ″{label}″ is no longer valid and has therefore been removed from your order.
The shipping method that you had chosen is no longer available and has therefore been removed from your order.
